column2: Position:  Quality Head Industry:  Pharmaceutical Excipients Manufacturing Location:  Nagpur, Maharashtra  Salary   Range:  7.2 LPA - 9LPA Profile   Summary:  The Quality Head is responsible for overseeing the quality assurance and quality control processes within the pharmaceutical excipients manufacturing facility. This role ensures that all products meet the highest standards of quality, safety, and regulatory compliance. Company   Overview: NB   Entrepreneurs,  based in Nagpur, is a well-established manufacturer of pharmaceutical excipients, including microcrystalline cellulose, magnesium stearate, and croscarmellose sodium. The company emphasizes high quality and compliance, holding ISO 9001 and cGMP certifications. NB Entrepreneurs aims to be a global leader in the excipient industry by providing high-quality, innovative products that meet the evolving needs of their customers. Their mission focuses on excellence in manufacturing and customer service, ensuring that their products enhance the quality of pharmaceuticals and other related products. Vision:  The vision of NB Entrepreneurs is to expand their global footprint, becoming a trusted partner for pharmaceutical companies worldwide. They strive to continuously improve their processes and products, leveraging cutting-edge technology and sustainable practices to maintain their leadership position in the market. Key   Responsibilities: 1.   Quality   Assurance   Management: 1. Develop, implement, and maintain the quality management system (QMS) in accordance  with regulatory standards (e.g., GMP, ISO). 2. Ensure continuous improvement of quality processes and systems. 3. Conduct regular audits and inspections to ensure compliance with internal and external  quality standards. 2.   Regulatory   Compliance: 1. Stay updated with relevant regulations and standards (FDA, EMA, ICH guidelines) and ensure  the facility's compliance. 2. Prepare and manage regulatory submissions and documentation. 3. Serve as the primary contact for regulatory agencies and manage inspections. 3.   Quality   Control: 1. Oversee all quality control activities, including raw material, in-process, and finished product  testing. 2. Ensure the accuracy and reliability of all analytical methods and laboratory results. 3. Develop and maintain quality control procedures and protocols. 4.   Risk   Management: 1. Identify and assess quality risks and implement appropriate mitigation strategies. 2. Conduct root cause analysis for quality issues and ensure corrective and preventive actions  (CAPA) are implemented effectively. 3. Maintain a robust change control system to manage changes in processes, materials, and  products. 5.   Documentation   and   Reporting: 1. Ensure proper documentation of all quality-related activities, including batch records,  deviations, and CAPA reports. 2. Prepare and present quality reports to senior management. 3. Manage electronic documentation systems to ensure data integrity and traceability. 6.   Team   Leadership   and   Development: 1. Lead and mentor the quality assurance and quality control teams, providing guidance and  professional development opportunities. 2. Foster a culture of quality awareness and continuous improvement across the organization. 3. Conduct performance evaluations and provide feedback to team members. 7.   Customer   Focus: 1. Address customer complaints and quality-related inquiries in a timely and effective manner. 2. Collaborate with customers to understand their quality requirements and ensure products  meet or exceed expectations. 3. Maintain strong relationships with key customers and stakeholders. Skills   &   Qualifications: 1. Educational Background: Bachelor's or Masters degree in Pharmacy, Chemistry,  Microbiology, or a related field. Advanced degrees or certifications in quality management  or regulatory affairs are advantageous. 2. Experience: Minimum of 10-15 years of experience in quality assurance and quality control  within the pharmaceutical or excipient manufacturing industry, with at least 5 years in a  leadership role. 3. Technical Skills: In-depth knowledge of GMP, ISO standards, and regulatory requirements.  Proficiency in quality management systems and laboratory information management  systems (LIMS). 4. Regulatory Knowledge: Extensive experience with regulatory submissions and interactions  with regulatory agencies. 5. Leadership Skills: Strong leadership and team management skills, with experience in leading  cross-functional teams. 6. Problem-Solving Skills: Excellent analytical and problem-solving abilities to address complex  quality issues and implement effective solutions. 7. Communication Skills: Strong written and verbal communication skills for effective  collaboration with internal and external stakeholders. Desired   Competencies: 1. Strategic thinking and planning capabilities. 2. High attention to detail and a proactive approach to quality management. 3. Ability to work under pressure and manage multiple priorities. 4. Commitment to maintaining the highest standards of quality and regulatory compliance.
column11: Documentation, Quality Assurance, Regulatory Compliance, Risk Management, Quality Control, Team Leadership, Customer Focus, Reporting

column2: This position reports into the VP Engineering at Airlinq. He will work with the Engineering and Development teams to build and maintain a testing and quality program for the full suite of Airlinq s products and services. The role involves not limited to the following:       Design, implement and manage a thorough Quality Assurance process for the company, including identification of the technical resources needed to perform QA on all software development products.         Design, implement and maintain test procedures, including test cases, as necessary for each release and for regression testing.         Maintain and track resolution of issues found during testing.         Perform the primary QA functions and ensure that all products are delivered with optimal quality.         Participate in regular meetings with Engineering and Development (including daily scrums) to represent and prioritize QA requirements.         Develop and maintain the portfolio of internal and external documentation and participate as needed in external meetings with customers and prospects.         Working independently as well as jointly work with others on other applications.     Skills Experience requirements:      Domain Expertise:         Knowledge of GSM, SS7, LTE         HTTP/SOAP/REST API based testing         Technical know-how on GTPV1/V2, DIAMTER (S6a), SCCP, TCAP, MAP, CAMEL protocol stacks         Technical Skills:         Scripting languages like Perl / TCL / Python         UNIX (Solaris/Linux) and shell/Perl scripting, windows         Oracle 8i/9i         Selenium, JMETER, basic understanding of telecom nodes and terminologies         Testing Skills:         API testing, GUI testing         Experience in test automation using C/C++ and shell/Perl scripting on UNIX         Knowledge of various test methods         Must have done test automation for Telecom products         Tools:         POSTMAN, SOAP UI, Wireshark, JMETER         Bugzilla/JIRA, Test Link     Work Experience:      12+ years of relevant experience.     Minimum Education:      B.E. / B.Tech. , M.E. /M. Tech in Computer Science / Electronics Engineering / MCA.

column2: If you are a Release Train Leader (RTL) and looking for career opportunity, Emerson has and exciting offer to you! Manage and optimize the flow of value through the Agile Release Train (ART)     Facilitate ART practices and PI execution, including but not limited to PI readiness, SAFe events and summarize team PI Objectives into ART PI Objectives.     Escalate and track impediments, manage risk and ensure delivery of value and relentless improvement.     Have focus on Continuous Improvement for the ART and steer the ART in the right direction. column2: We are looking for an ERP Quality Assurance Lead who has experience with web-based application testing and ERP systems, particularly Odoo ERP across major functional modules. As an ERP QA Lead, you will be responsible for developing and documenting formal test strategies and test plans, and will lead all testing activities relating to our ERP system. You will be expected to stay in close collaboration with the core project team to understand the system and user requirements, translate them into test suites and test cases, and manage the testing scope.      You will need to perform hands on testing as well as define and track quality assurance metrics to ensure system adheres to quality testing standards and procedures.   The key attributes needed in this position include strong multi-tasking, detail-orientation, fast-learning, and organization skills as well as expertise in the software development life cycle and knowledge of quality assurance methodologies.   Job Responsibilities:          Lead all testing efforts related to Odoo ERP testing across all modules             Define, determine, and document testing methodologies and test strategies for the ERP project             Ensure all testing is planned, executed and delivered in accordance with industry best practices, and to our quality standards, while meeting tight deadlines             Translate business, technical, and functional requirements into detailed test plans, test suites and test cases, and execute test scenarios that would guarantee maximum coverage             Be an integral part of the project core team in providing data, functional, integration, performance, and regression, testing             Proactively identify bugs, seek resolution and maintain testing schedule             Track quality assurance metrics such as defects, defect counts, test results, and test statuses             Ensure all identified risks from testing are escalated and mitigated appropriately             With hands-on testing, detect, isolate, reproduce and track defects, and verify fixes             Lead and set standards for junior team members to achieve high quality work             Recommend when automation should be introduced into the project, and take a lead on providing automation test candidates     Skills Required:          5+ years of Quality Assurance experience on web-based applications, functional, and Odoo ERP systems             Bachelor s Degree in Computer Science/Information Technology or comparable science degree, or MCA             Testing experience with Odoo ERP across all modules, and testing integrations between Odoo and thirty-party Apps             Understanding of full software development life cycle methodology             Experience writing test plans, test suites, and test cases for ERP systems             Hands on testing experience in a complex, fast-paced, highly results-oriented environment             Experience with identifying, creating, and executing functional, integrational, and regression test cases             Experience using Jira and issue and bug tracking             Excellent organization and prioritization skills             Possess excellent oral and written communication skills             Automation experience will be an added advantage             Performance and Load Testing experience preferred column1: Software Development Engineer in Test - Pan india
column2: About the role            You will be responsible for ensuring that the new releases we make for features, enhancements or new products meet the strict standards of quality & consistency.     The buck stops at you and you will have the final say on the correctness, reliability & consistency of our builds.     You will prepare detailed test cases that ensure coverage in our complex platform and you will help developers identity & replicate any inconsistencies.     You will also work closely with support teams to reproduce reported bugs and communicate them to developers and product teams.            Your Responsibilities            Owning the quality of any deliverables including new features and enhancements.      Working closely with the product/engineering team in understanding the requirements and user workflow.      Identify quality assurance process bottlenecks and suggest actions for improvements.      Writing highly efficient manual test cases and performing functional, adhoc and regression testing.      Strong organizational and problem solving skills with great attention to detail, including the      ability to track multiple test executions simultaneously and synthesize the results.            Your Core Skills            You place quality over any other virtue.     2+ years experience in testing web applications      Experience in using defect tracking system to report, track and resolve defects.      Experience with API testing and performance testing with tools such as JMeter, Postman.      Understanding of HTML,CSS,JS and browser debugging/console tools      Test automation experience such as Selenium ,Cypress or any other framework.      Hands-on experience with both white box and black box testing.      Good knowledge of working with at least one Source control system - Git,SVN etc.      Good understanding of the Agile software development methodology (Kanban or Scrum) and QAs role in it            Additional Skills            Prior experience in B2B SaaS or a CRM product or in a complex web based software product with multiple product areas utilizing multiple services and technologies      Experience working in cross-functional teams
